Package com.eventApp.Utils

package com.eventApp.Utils
Utility package containing helper classes and common functionality.

This package provides utility classes for database connectivity, input validation, and session management that are used throughout the CampusConnect application.

<h3>Key Utility Classes:</h3>
  • DatabaseConnection - Centralized database connection management
  • ValidationUtils - Input validation and data verification utilities
  • CurrentUser - Session management for the currently logged-in user

These utilities provide reusable functionality that promotes code consistency and reduces duplication across the application.

Since:
1.0
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CurrentUser
    Utility class to manage the currently logged-in user in Event App.
    DatabaseConnection
    Utility class for managing database connections in the CampusConnect system.
    ValidationUtils
    Utility class providing static methods for validating various inputs used throughout the system.
